hero.description: Are you striving for peace of mind and life harmony? With us, you can achieve it. Our professional therapeutic assistance will help you overcome internal obstacles and regain emotional balance. Schedule a visit and start your journey towards improvement.

cards.title: Support for Children and Youth
cards.description: We support the youngest - children and adolescents in coping with problems and building mental resilience to everyday challenges, including school and peer relationships.

cards.title: Personal Development
cards.description: Together with clients, we create personalized plans for personal development that take into account their goals, passions, and values.

cards.title: Psychotherapy
cards.description: Our team of therapists and psychologists is here to help you through difficult times and find your way back to emotional balance.

cards.title: Psychiatric Treatment
cards.description: Through diagnosis and treatment of often traumatic experiences, we can help select appropriate medications, thereby reducing emotional distress in the mind and body, and ultimately improving quality of life.

cards.title: Psychological Diagnosis
cards.description: With our support, clients can safely share their emotions and experiences and receive professional help in diagnosing and naming emotional problems they come with.

cards.title: Neurodiversity
cards.description: We help people with ADHD understand and manage their unique traits such as impulsivity, hyperactivity, and concentration difficulties. We build coping strategies and achieve success in personal and professional life.

hero.title: We Are Just Like You and We Work for <underscore>You!</underscore>
hero.description: We will do everything to make your life happier.

intro.main: We know that life has not only beautiful moments and often can be tough, but we believe everyone has answers within themselves and the potential to fight to become themselves and overcome even the toughest adversities.
intro.description1: Emotions are a compass guiding us to where we truly, subconsciously want to be. In today's overwhelming everyday life, it's easy to lose our true 'self,' especially in the face of others' expectations.
intro.description2: The presence of another human being, regardless of their past - in a conversation about what hurts - without judgment, with empathy, in their own authenticity, and in front of someone who can truly listen and wants to help, can truly heal.

idea.title: Why Therapy with Us Is a Good Idea?

items.title: Low Prices
items.description: The prices for cooperation with our best specialists start from 150 PLN - probably some of the lowest rates on the market. Despite the low price, our specialists are focused on quality:
list: they aim for effective, as fast as possible help, while many therapists suggest to patients that they need their therapy to last for years, which is not always necessary

items.title: Modern Approach to Mental Support
items.description: Mental health supports the beautiful individuality of the individual, focuses on development, positive traits of the patient, resources, acceptance, includes contemporary therapeutic methods like working with art, science, creativity, sexuality, body, in relation, with imaginations, nature, inner parts of personality, client satisfaction, working with animals, whether it is focused on self-realization or inner harmony

items.description: Our specialists work in 3 languages, are available online, making our services accessible to everyone worldwide

hero.description1: We want psychotherapeutic services to be accessible to everyone, as caring for mental health is especially important.
hero.description2: That's why our services are probably some of the cheapest on the market, so we offer psychotherapy starting from 150 PLN.

intro_top.title: Individual Therapy
intro_top.description: We offer psychiatric consultations dedicated to diagnosing and treating various mental disorders and provide pharmacological support if necessary. Our psychotherapy for children and adolescents focuses on adapting therapy to individual needs and challenges to support healthy psychological and emotional development.

items.title: Psychiatric Consultation
items.description: We offer psychiatric consultations dedicated to diagnosing and treating various mental disorders and provide pharmacological support if necessary. Our psychotherapy for children and adolescents focuses on adapting therapy to individual needs and challenges to support healthy psychological and emotional development.

items.title: Online Psychotherapy
items.description: Within online psychotherapy, we offer convenient and flexible therapy sessions, enabling access to therapeutic support from anywhere. Our couples therapy focuses on improving communication, building bonds, and resolving conflicts in the relationship. Family therapy helps in creating healthier relationships and better understanding mutual needs.

items.title: Psychotherapy for Neurodiverse Individuals (ADHD, Autism, etc.)
items.description: For neurodiverse individuals, such as those with ADHD or autism, we offer specialized psychotherapy tailored to their unique needs and ways of functioning. In our sexological consultations, we can help resolve sexual problems and support healthy sexuality and intimacy.

items.title: Cognitive-Behavioral Therapy
items.description: Within cognitive-behavioral therapy, we focus on changing thoughts and behaviors leading to improved mental functioning. Our humanistic/Gestalt therapy is based on trust in the client's inner wisdom and promotes self-awareness and personal growth.

items.title: Integrated Therapy
items.description: In integrated therapy, we combine different therapeutic approaches, adapting to the individual needs and preferences of the client. Career counseling helps clients identify career goals and make informed career decisions.

items.title: Psychological Consultation
items.description: Our psychological consultation enables understanding and coping with various life challenges. Through mentoring/coaching, we support clients in achieving personal and professional goals.

items.title: Dietetic Consultation
items.description: Our dietetic consultation provides professional assistance in healthy eating and weight management. Therapeutic body work allows clients to discover and process trauma through mindfulness of the body and its sensations.

items.title: PTSD Therapy (Eye Movement Desensitization and Reprocessing - EMDR)
items.description: PTSD therapy using EMDR provides effective tools for coping with post-traumatic stress disorder symptoms. Art therapy enables expression and processing of emotions through art and creative activities.

items.title: Animal-Assisted Therapy
items.description: Animal-assisted therapy utilizes interaction with animals to promote mental and emotional health. We also offer home-based psychotherapy, providing convenience and accessibility of therapy for individuals with limited mobility.

intro_bottom.title: Group Therapy
intro_bottom.description1: Our group therapy provides emotional support and the opportunity to share experiences with individuals facing similar challenges.
intro_bottom.description2: We also specialize in therapy for burnout, providing tools to cope with stress and restore life balance.

items.title: Couples Therapy
items.description: We offer psychiatric consultations dedicated to diagnosing and treating various mental disorders and provide pharmacological support if necessary. Our psychotherapy for children and adolescents focuses on adapting therapy to individual needs and challenges to support healthy psychological and emotional development.

items.title: Group Therapy
items.description: Our group therapy provides emotional support and the opportunity to share experiences with individuals facing similar challenges. We also specialize in therapy for burnout, providing tools to cope with stress and restore life balance.

diagnosis.title: Diagnoses
diagnosis.description1: We offer various diagnoses and certificates related to mental health. We conduct diagnoses of autism and Asperger's syndrome, providing precise and comprehensive assessments of mental health.
diagnosis.description2: Our assessments are based on international diagnostic standards, taking into account each patient's individual characteristics and life context.
diagnosis.description3: This allows us to provide personalized therapeutic recommendations and support.

items.title: ADHD Diagnosis
items.description: We also diagnose ADHD, identifying and describing specific characteristics and symptoms of this disorder. Our diagnoses are based on a thorough clinical interview, behavioral observations, and standardized psychological tests, enabling accurate assessment of therapeutic and educational needs of individuals with ADHD.

items.title: Personality Diagnosis (Disorders) / MMPI
items.description: For individuals suspected of personality disorders, we conduct examinations, including psychological tests such as the Minnesota Multiphasic Personality Inventory (MMPI) and various methods of personality diagnosis. Our diagnoses are comprehensive and take into account both personality traits and the psychosocial functioning of the patient.

items.title: Child Psychological Diagnosis
items.description: We also specialize in diagnosing children, providing psychological diagnoses for children and PTSD diagnoses in adults and children, using standard diagnostic criteria from the DSM-5. Our assessments consider various aspects of the child's functioning, including emotional development, adaptive behaviors, and relationships with the environment.

items.title: Diagnosis of Psychological Disorders (Depression, Bipolar Disorder, Schizophrenia, etc.)
items.description: We also diagnose psychological disorders such as depression, bipolar disorder (i.e., bipolar affective disorder), or schizophrenia, based on observations, psychological tests, and clinical interviews. Our diagnoses are based on the latest research and clinical guidelines, ensuring the accuracy and reliability of our assessments.

items.title: Certificates of Disability
items.description: In addition to diagnoses, we also provide certificates of disability and other documents confirming disability, mental disorders, or illnesses, providing support and documentation necessary for applying for benefits and social assistance. Our certificates comply with applicable legal regulations and take into account the individual needs and life situation of each patient.

Â§ 2. Goals and tasks of the entity

  1. The purpose of the Entity's activities is to provide patients with outpatient and/or health services by taking actions aimed at maintaining, saving, restoring or improving health, as well as conducting other medical activities resulting from the treatment process or separate regulations regulating the principles of their implementation. Additionally, the Entity is involved in promoting health and providing health education in the field of psychotherapy and psychological support.

  2. The tasks of the Entity are:

  3. Providing education in the field of psychotherapy and various forms of psychological support.

  4. Providing basic health services in the field of psychiatry.

  5. Providing psychotherapeutic services and psychological consultations, with particular emphasis on:

    • Providing health services in accordance with the latest medical knowledge, respecting patient rights, and in accordance with ethical principles and applicable law;

    • Promoting a healthy lifestyle and conducting health education activities for patients;

    • Participation in the education process of people preparing to work in medical professions and people already working in the industry by organizing practical internships and improvement courses;

    • Carrying out other tasks resulting from applicable local legal provisions and related to the activities of the Entity

Â§ 3. Type and scope of provided educational and health services

  1. The entity conducts medical activities, providing health services on an outpatient basis.

  2. The entity specializes in providing outpatient health services in the field of psychiatry, psychological counseling and psychotherapy, including in particular:

  3. Conducting medical consultations;

  4. Providing psychological counseling and psychoeducational therapy;

  5. Issuing decisions and certificates regarding patients' health status;

  6. Issuing prescriptions for necessary medications;

  7. Activities promoting health and health education of patients;

  8. Organizing psychoeducational classes;

  9. Conducting training and courses in the field of medicine consistent with the Entity's business profile;

  10. Improving skills and education in the field of psychotherapy, psychology, art therapy and similar, as well as improving professional qualifications in this field

  11. The entity conducts educational activities by providing educational services in the field of psychotherapy and psychological support via online and stationary meetings

Â§ 4. Organizational structure

  1. The entity carries out medical and educational activities through the operation of a medical facility and an educational unit under the name Modern School of Psychotherapy Sp. Z. o. o., which is the owner of the Mental Recovery brand.

  2. The structure of the medical facility and the educational unit referred to above includes:

  1. Free cancellation or change of appointment date is possible no later than 24 hours before the scheduled visit.

The prepayment will be refunded by the Service Provider within 7 days from: a. the date of cancellation or change of the booked appointment date in accordance with section 1 (100% refund of the prepayment), b. the day of changing the appointment date by the Patient without observing the conditions specified in section 1, by canceling the previous date and registering for a new date (50% refund of the prepayment), c. the day of cancellation of the booked visit date by the Service Provider in accordance with section 6 (100% refund of the prepayment), to the bank account number from which the payment was made, or in the case of cash or payment card payment in the office, to the bank account number provided by the Patient. At the patient's request, the doctor may not disclose complete information. Informing other people about the patient's health condition requires his consent, unless the law provides otherwise or obtaining consent is not possible; d. expect health care workers to maintain professional secrecy; e. participate in the selection of the attending physician; f. participate in making informed therapeutic decisions regarding his health by obtaining full, clear and understandable information about potential risks and benefits, the possibility of using alternative treatment and the consequences of refusing the proposed medical procedure.
